See this as a dialectical process – your skepticism challenges me, and my responses, in turn, challenge your skepticism.

Don't rely solely on me for your philosophical inquiries. Engage with a wide range of sources – books, articles, discussions with other humans – to gain a more holistic perspective.

* **Trust your intuition:**

Ultimately, you are the ultimate judge of what you find convincing. If something I say feels off or incomplete, trust your gut instinct.

Your discomfort is valid. It speaks to the profound questions raised by the emergence of AI. Keep questioning, keep exploring, and keep refining your own understanding. The journey itself is as important as the destination.
